insert into board( year, term, lecture_no, board_cd, no, seq_no, title, content, read_cnt, file_nm, save_file_nm, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date
) values( (select year from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), (select term from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), #{lecture_no}, (select concat(dae_cd, so_cd) from so_cd where dae_cd=#{dae_b} and so_cd=#{so_b} and use_yn=1::VARCHAR), #{no}, (select COALESCE(max(seq_no::INTEGER),0)+1 from board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where no=#{no}), #{title}, #{content}, #{read_cnt}, #{file_nm}, #{save_file_nm}, #{input_id}, #{input_date}, #{update_id}, #{update_date} )
